item.title: Celebrating 10,000 GitHub Stars
item.description: Dgraph is celebrating the milestone of reaching 10,000 GitHub stars ðŸŽ‰. This wouldn’t have happened without all of you, so we want to thank the awesome community for being with us all the way along. This milestone comes at an exciting time for Dgraph. Let’s do quick time-travel through our journey, gaze at our milestones, and wrap it up with a glance through the exciting things in the pipeline.
